name: Loot Brute Demo
description:
Loot Brute is a slimy Whack-A-Mole arcade game where you get your jollies punching goblins, relieving them of their piles and pocketfuls of hoarded loot. Smash your way to the upper echelons of goblin society, collecting as much loot as you can to feed your hungry goblin-smashin' glove.

This is a demo of a work in progress!
